message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to its market value of $150. I trust it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions.
